Title: Energy Market â€“ Analyst/Consultant - Renewables gases - Madrid
RoleDescription:
We are looking for great people to join our team of energy consultants. We are currently recruiting for our Madrid team, but we have regular opportunities in our other offices Bogota, Bangkok, Beijing, Berlin, Dubai, Dusseldorf, Helsinki, London, Oxford, Milan, New York, Oslo, Paris, Stockholm, Vienna, and Zurich.
The challenges of decarbonisation, decentralisation and digitalisation require us to continually challenge our existing ideas to remain at the forefront of thinking on the future of the energy industry. Our vision is to be the most recommended advisor for the energy transition. If you are as interested as we are in this dynamic industry, we would love to hear from you.
You will have the opportunity to gain knowledge and experience to become an industry specialist within a stimulating and supportive environment. Our team specialises in all aspects of the energy transition. We offer strategic and commercial advice, develop policy and regulations, model systems and markets and support transactions. We pride ourselves on our in-depth analysis and strong client relationships.
Often the work is office based but there are many opportunities to travel for shorter trips for client meetings or for entire projects where work is on the client site. With more than 800 consultants across over 20 offices on 5 continents, and supported by 19,000 experts at AFRY in design, engineering and digitalisation, we are driven by the idea of helping our clients find solutions to business-critical questions. For individuals looking for international experience we can also offer secondments to other offices.
As a primary responsibility, you will support AFRY consulting activities for a wide range of clients  including major financial investors, the largest Iberian and international utilities, government, and regulatory bodies  through projects carried out mainly in Spain, Portugal and Latin AmericaIf you are as interested as we are in this dynamic industry, we would love to hear from you.Below we explain the main skills that we look for in our Analysts/Consultants:A Masters degree, or higher, in maths, engineering, economics or science related subjectWorking experience of 1-3 years specialized in renewables gases with previous experience in the industry.Advanced analytical and quantitative skills. We undertake a lot of complex analysis, a good proportion of which is numerical, so we are looking for people with an aptitude for complex quantitative and qualitative analysis, statistics, manipulation of large data and diverse mathematical models. This includes the ability to pay attention to detail and use MS Excel proficiently, understanding programming logic, and creative problem-solving skills.Excellent team working and leadership. All the work we do requires team working and you will be responsible for the delivery of the whole team. This involves planning the work, supporting the team, anticipating challenges, leading by example, and accountability towards the client (with more Senior support when required).Being fluent in Spanish and English. On the one hand our clients are located in Spanish and non-Spanish speaking countries, and on the other hand our work requires day-to-day collaboration  in English  with other AFRY offices.Writing and communication skills. Report-writing and presenting in public is a core part of our work, therefore we are also looking for the ability to explain complex information in a clear and logical way in English, both in writing and orally.Proactivity and responsibility. You will be working in a commercial environment against budgets and deadlines so you will need to be able to think for yourself, be proactive and have a business-oriented mindset.Passion for energy markets and policies. You have a holistic understanding of European electricity or gas market dynamics, sustainability challenges, and energy policies.Proven hands-on experience of indicatively 1 to 3 years in:any energy field (e.g. trading, renewable energies, retail markets, networks etc.)any business practice (e.g. transactions, management consulting, engineering etc.)Additionally, we highly value:computer programming (e.g. Matlab, Visual Basic, VBA etc.)database skills (e.g. MS Access or MS SQL Server)knowledge of Portuguese, French or another European languagecontacts in your industryWe value a healthy work life balance and diversity. We can consider a range of flexible working arrangements. Please include your preferences in your application.In AFRY Management Consulting we offer a competitive salary, a performance related bonus scheme and an excellent range of benefits.As part of your online application process, please provide a CV and covering letter stating why you want to work for AFRY and your salary expectations. We only accept online applications.If we think you could be a good fit for the organization you will be invited for a telephone interview following which, if we are both happy to continue the process, you will then be invited to a face-to-face interview. To allow us to assess your skills in practice this will be accompanied by Excel, Word and analytical reasoning exercises. In addition, you will have an informal chat with members of the team to find out more about what it is like to work at AFRY.You must have a right to live and work in Spain.At AFRY, we engineer change in everything we do. Change happens when brave ideas come together. When we collaborate, innovate technology, and embrace challenging points of view. Thats how we're making future. We are actively looking for qualified candidates to join our inclusive and diverse teams across the globe. Join us in accelerating the transition towards a sustainable future.

Title: Regional Leader for Energy Networks for Spain & Italy - Madrid
RoleDescription: We are looking for a great business leader to join our team of energy consultants. You would be based in our Madrid office, working in our consulting activities in the Spanish, Italian and Latin American grid market for power, gas, heating & cooling.As Regional Leader for Energy Networks for Italy & Spain, you will be responsible for growing the consulting business for electricity, gas and heating network operators in Italy and Spain, potentially also in Latin America. You will work closely with the Global Leader Energy Networks and the national country organisations to design and implement a successful market entry. You will build on existing business relationships, use your own network and expand it to successfully establish AFRY Management Consulting in strategic consulting projects. You will do this through structured, personal relationship building on site and the resulting management of bidding processes. Your success will be measured primarily by the jointly set target of revenue growth.The challenges of decarbonisation, decentralisation and digitalisation require us to continually challenge our existing ideas to remain at the forefront of thinking on the future of the energy industry. Our vision is to be the most recommended advisor for the energy transition. If you are as interested as we are in this dynamic industry, we would love to hear from you.With more than 800 consultants across over 20 offices on 5 continents, and supported by 19,000 experts at AFRY in design, engineering and digitalisation, we are driven by the idea of helping our clients find solutions to business-critical questions. As part of our Madrid consulting team you will also have the opportunity to collaborate regularly with colleagues around other offices like Bogota, Bangkok, Beijing, Berlin, Dubai, Dusseldorf, Helsinki, London, Oxford, Milan, New York, Oslo, Paris, Stockholm, Vienna, and Zurich.Below we explain the main skills that we look for in our Regional Leaders. We are looking for great people with a diverse background to grow our Strategy Advisory Team:Masters Degree, ideally with an electrical engineering background At least 7 years of experience in strategic roles in the energy, grid or consulting industryExisting network at the decision-maker level of grid operators in Spain & ItalyVery strong affinity for relationship management and networking in the grid industryExceptional willingness to win and the associated commitmentHigh willingness to travel Business Fluent in Italian and SpanishWe value a healthy work life balance and diversity. We can consider a range of flexible working arrangements. Please include your preferences in your application.In AFRY Management Consulting we offer a competitive salary, a performance related bonus scheme and an excellent range of benefits.As part of your online application process, please provide a CV and covering letter stating why you want to work for AFRY and your salary expectations. We only accept online applications.If we think you could be a good fit for the organisation you will be invited for a telephone interview following which, if we are both happy to continue the process, you will then be invited to a face-to-face interview. To allow us to assess your skills in practice this will be accompanied by Excel, Word and analytical reasoning exercises. In addition, you will have an informal chat with members of the team to find out more about what it is like to work at AFRY.You must have a right to live and work in Spain.At AFRY, we engineer change in everything we do. Change happens when brave ideas come together. When we collaborate, innovate technology, and embrace challenging points of view. Thats how we're making future. Title: Erfaren projektleder til Energiprojekter
RoleDescription:
Vil du arbejde med spndende og varierende projekter indenfor energi og kunne du tnke dig at blive del af et dygtigt tvrfagligt team, hvor humret og ambitionerne er trnhje? S passer du perfekt til vores team Projects & Project Management!Vi sger en erfaren projektleder med faglighed indenfor el-forsyning til vores forretningsenhed Energy. Det danske el-system er i rivende udvikling, hvilket bde medfre komplekse udfordringer og spndende projekter. Vi stter en re i at vre engagerede i den bredygtige udvikling, der beskytter miljet og giver god forretningsmssig mening, i alt hvad vi gr. Vores ekspertise indenfor el og forsyning dkker alle aspekter af elproduktion, transmission og distribution samt markedsanalyse i alle faser fra analyse over programmering til drift af det frdige anlg.Hvem er mine kommende kolleger?
Du slutter dig til vores team i enten Aarhus, Aalborg, Kolding eller Herlev. Teamet bestr projektledere med solid erfaring indenfor energisektoren. Og dkker vi en bred vifte af kompetencer, men med fokus p projektledelse af alle typer og strrelser af projekter.Som team har vi ogs ansvaret for at ge vores samlede niveau af projektledelse, projektledelsesvrktjer og kvalitetsstyring, i AFRYs Energy division i Danmark. Vi er ved at opbygge en gruppe med projektstttefunktioner.Om opgaverne
Din dagligdag bliver prget af gode kollegaer, faglige udfordringer og stor medbestemmelse.I jobbet vil du arbejde med projektledelse af projekter indenfor distribution- og transmission, hjspndingsstationer, kabel- og luftledningsanlg og tilslutning af produktionsanlg, herunder projektdiscipliner ssomFremdrift, koordinering og interessenthndtering Risikohndering, tids- og konomistyring, kontraktstyring m.v. Rapportering til bl.a. styregruppe og direktionUdarbejdelse af udbudsmateriale og forhandlingForretningsudvikling og lbende forbedringer og forandringer.Du vil ogs medvirke til samarbejde og vidensdeling p tvrs af fagomrder i AFRY, herunder vil du formidle din projektfaglighed bde internt og eksternt.Det er en fordel at kende til el-forsynings-branchen, men vi gr isr efter projektledelseskompetencen, s vi forestiller os at du vil passe godt ind i jobbet, hvis du:har 5-10 rs projektledererfaring inden for el-forsyninghar kendskab til eller erfaring med totalleveranceprojekter  EPC, EPCM og turnkey.har erfaring med leverandrhndteringhar rapporteringserfaring til styregrupper og direktionhar kompetencer i udarbejdelse af udbudsmateriale samt forhandlinger og kontraktstyringhar arbejdet med forretningsudvikling, forandringsledelse og forretningsprocesser.Til rollen forventes gode samarbejdsevner, evnen til at skabe kontakter, og at du er imdekommende og lsningsorienteret samt evner at tale i jenhjde med dine kolleger og interessenter. Det vil sige at du er en god kommunikator og kan beg dig p alle niveauer i en organisation. Du har nemt ved at beg dig p dansk og engelsk i skrift og tale.Vi ser med fordel p en IPMA eller Prince2 certificering, og erfaring med implementering af projektledelsesvrktjer i organisationer og teams er ogs et godt kort.AFRY er en international ingenir-, design- og rdgivningsvirksomhed med 18.000 dedikerede eksperter inden for infrastruktur, industri, energi og digitalisering. I Danmark er vi omkring 850 kollegaer, der arbejder med byggeri, transport, procesindustri, pharmaindustri, automation, energi og arkitektur.Vi er et af Nordens strste ingenirhuse og stter rammerne for en god arbejdsplads, hvor der er tid til at udvikle din faglighed gennem projekter fra A-Z. Vi samarbejder p tvrs af fag og landegrnser, og giver dig rig mulighed for at accelerere din karriere.Sparring, feedback og teamwork er ngleord i vores daglige arbejde, hvor digitalisering og bredygtighed er strategiske pejlemrker.  Vi efterstrber en venlig og rummelig kultur med respekt for hinanden. Vi arbejder bevidst med inklusion og diversitet  hos os kan du vre dig selv. Og s er vi vilde med fleksibilitet, for der skal vre tid til alt det, der giver vrdi. Ikke kun p kontoret, men ogs derhjemme hos familien og vennerne. Af andre goder kan vi nvne:afvekslende og varierede opgaver og projekter for store og velkendte private og offentlige kunderinterne udviklingsmuligheder i en af landets frende ingenirvirksomhederet stort tvrfagligt netvrk af kompetente kolleger at sparre meden god pensionsordning, en tryg sundhedsforsikring samt massageordningfamilievenlige og fleksible vilkren sund kantineordningaktive personaleforeninger og sociale arrangementer.Interesseret?
